==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|お|ね|yomi=k}}

===Etymology===
From {{etyl|ojp|ja|sort=おね}}. Compound of {{suffix|lang=ja|sort=おね|尾|tr1=o|t1=a mountain ridge|根|tr2=ne|t2=root; something sticking up}}.

===Pronunciation===
* {{IPA|lang=ja|[o̞.ne̞]}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|おね|hhira=をね}}

# a [[mountain]] [[ridge]]
#: {{ja-usex|'''尾根'''伝いに歩く|'''おね''' つたい に あるく|to walk along a '''ridge'''}}
#: {{ja-usex|'''尾根'''まで登る|'''おね''' まで のぼる|to climb up to a '''ridge'''}}

====Synonyms====
* {{ja-r|峰|みね}}
* {{ja-r|稜線|りょうせん}}
* {{ja-r|脊梁|せきりょう}}
